description:
Learn to speak in Hindi via 150+ everyday phrases. Fast, easy and fun way to learn Hindi.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for YOU in Hindi. Anytime, Anywhere

Meeting friends and co-workers from India could be much more fun with this app.

Focus is on every day phrases and app is categorized by following topics:

Greetings and General words,
Phrases for courtesy,
Food, Drink and Going out,
Place, People and Family,
Travelling around,
General Questions,
Police Emergency,
Medical and Disaster Emergency,
Shopping,
Numbers and Measures,
Vocabulary,
Pronunciation and Grammar.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
